website_summaries.verdict: A first-rate range hood that ensures you won't have to worry about loud noise while you cook.
pros: Delivers a noise level less than 65 decibels for ultra-quiet operation
Offers a convenient 3-speed touch-screen control and LCD display with time clock
Comes with a stainless steel body and dishwasher-safe steel baffle filters
cons: May require 2 or more people to install
LED lights are not very bright

customer_reviews.title: Requires 8" ductwork!
customer_reviews.text: Can't be the price for the amount of cfm it moves. The instruction manual could be better, but a professional installer or a diy-er who knows what they are doing should be able to figure it out. Buyers should make sure the that this unit is equipped with an 8' diameter duct. You really need this large size to move this amount of air. My house had an existing 6" duct that I had to climb up into the attic and change to 8". The lights could be brighter, but this is an awesome value buy! This thing has lots of suction power!!!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond K.

customer_reviews.title: Pics included. Great value, but is 4 speed not 3, which is GOOD.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this hood installed. Thrilled with the product. Can't wait to get this kitchen completed and cook some properly blackened stuff without smoking up the whole house. The fans (squirrel cage blowers) move a considerable amount of air. The noise level at max setting (4) is louder than I'd prefer but it's not louder than the old (and, weak) one that it replaced. It has 4 speeds, not 3 like the description currently says. Which is a nice bonus. The LED lights are not terribly bright but sufficient. They will definitely need replacing. I am not sure how high of a wattage those housings can handle but something MUST improve there.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Good sucking power
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the range hood bought from Golden vantage after 4 years of working and then the control touch panel screwed up. Called the support they said the model no longer support and no part to replace :(. Just bought this Cosmo which has the same power and dimension. It works good and sucks smoke really good. Only the round exhaust is kind of short when put it through the hole in the cabinet. Therefore it made the connections with the extension hose harder. Hopefully, it will last long and have good support and warranty.
customer_reviews.author: V. Do

customer_reviews.title: 36 inch Cosmo Hood is a nice addition to our kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: This Cosmo hood is very nice—now that it is installed. We are using it as a non-vented hood so we purchased the charcoal filters—Easy to install. The hood is not easy to install. One person cannot install alone. (But they do tell you this in the description.) We needed different hardware. Screwing the hood into our cabinet was not a good option. If we had left the screws in the hood, then the sharp screws would have been in my cabinet. We also did not feel that the hood was secure. We had to get bolts and install from the cabinet down into the hood. After installed, we are happy with the way the hood looks and operates.
customer_reviews.author: Lolly

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware !
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this hood, it cost me $200 to have install (which required 2 men) do the the size and weight and after getting it installed we noticed that the hood was deformed when it was probably made and there is dirt or dust behind the led screen and to send it back for a replacement I would have to pay to have it taken down and pay to have another installed again, very unhappy with amazon about this as the seemed very unconcerned and offered no other reasonable recourse other than a tiny discount Also: Forgot to mention it’s is very loud on full power and vibrates my cabinets
customer_reviews.author: ChrisS.

customer_reviews.title: It’s broken in less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: From this week on, the range hood often goes downtime intermittently: when my wife was cooking, the machine suddenly went down on its own, and the button didn't respond and couldn't be restarted. It could be started after a period of time (such as an hour). This phenomenon occurs more and more frequently. Bad experience, I has applied for repair, if the manufacturer can not solve, I will make a high claim from Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: JIANG CHANGYI

customer_reviews.title: Love this range hood fan.
customer_reviews.text: If there is one negative I can think of it's noise. But even that may be a feature. This fan and hood really works. It extends out over the range further than our old one. The round corners are much easier on my head than the sharp corners of the old hood. The filter system is ingenious -- more sold, easy to clean -- not flimsy. The lights are excellent. The control panel works beautifully. This is an excellent product and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Norgaard

customer_reviews.title: Cosmo QS90
customer_reviews.text: Nice elegant appearance, lights are excellent, several selection of suction which makes it very appealing. However, this unit is quite heavy, requires two people to install. This is not your typical light range hood like Broan which can be installed in less than 15 minutes, this took my handyman and me about an hour due to the weight. I would like to give it a five stars but because its weight and difficulty in installation gives it only a four stars. However, its suction power and its choices of speed, I rate it a five.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Angel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We just installed this yesterday and love the look and soft-touch functionality so so much! The suction power and noise level compared to the previous builder grade one is better by miles and we feel we could not have done any better than this. Now we need to see how well it will hold up over extended period of usage, an update to this review will follow in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Badri Lakkur

customer_reviews.title: Well-Worthy and Amazingly Styled Hood
customer_reviews.text: This hood has both a clean and elegant cut. It is also simple to use, and has a really great and a worthy strong CFM. Overall, it is simply beautiful. Not too noisy, and has a great strong suction. It really completes my kitchen. The gorgeous rounded-corners and overall clean cut and sleek really make this hood a well worthy made Hood for its price. Also, to add on it also came very quickly and efficiently. Lastly, I also like the fact that the brand name is not shown on the front so it fits in with other brand appliances. All-in-all, this was a terrific buy.
customer_reviews.author: Avi Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the exhaust hood! A bit involved during installation behind a granite. Took me 3 people to install. Mine did not come with the duct clamp. Will be requesting the manufacturer for one. But awesome construction, certainly good quality. Installation was involved because I had to drill 4 holes through granite, and 4 through wood cabinet at the top, which I am not sure if securing the back and the top was needed. I wished Cosmo had made recommendations on whether it was necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Very nice range hood
customer_reviews.text: I love the overall look and the quality of this unit. I was specifically looking for a hood made of stainless steel for the propane grill in my covered outdoor kitchen. Would have liked to have had marine grade stainless, but could not find one. I expect this one to rust a little in my particular application, but hopefully not too much.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality!.
customer_reviews.text: pros: the range hood looks beautiful. love the touch control, the delay shut off, thick stainless steel, solid construction, great sucking power, bright LED lights. cons: It's heavy, needed 2 people to do the installation or I did myself by using 2 car jacks to lift it up. the power cord should be able to switch the side. and I wish the vent could be smaller. The customer service is superb!
customer_reviews.author: G. YU

customer_reviews.title: Good quality; good value
customer_reviews.text: I've installed three or four range hoods now in different kitchen configurations. I've ended up using different vendors because of varying configuration, and this time picked this Cosmo product because it was an under-cabinet mount and the cfm was > 600. Just finished installation and very pleased with quality of the stainless steel (heavy), the quality of the fan motors (heavy!!), and the overall fit and finish. My only complaint is that this product weighs probably 2X as much as other similar fans and the install is difficult for one guy. The weight is due to the thickness of the SS (great!) and the quality of the fan motors. A great value for the price paid. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hontoni

customer_reviews.title: Great price for such a beautiful hood vent.
customer_reviews.text: We installed it yesterday. Pro: it is beautiful and about 1/3 the price of one at the hardware store. We had to cut the vent hole larger. We used 1 inch metal spacer we bought at Lowe’s for $2.38 each. It didn’t fit flush with the wood. Sucks a lot of air. We made a template out of Christmas paper. Con: the vent hole has flaps the prevent any creatures from sneaking in, but on level 4 the flaps vibrate and make a horrible noise. We put padding on them and it didn’t stop the noise. We removed the flaps easily.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty Mom

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after reading thru the reviews. It looks pretty good after hectic installation. The plates for the duct did not fit properly but had to adjust with steel plates. The fan is very powerful and the lights are very pleasant. So far I am satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.author: Ilias P

customer_reviews.title: Definitely will be impressed, I did change to a daylight  led bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Cosmo is the best, it was definitely time to upgrade, due to the amount of cooking that’s happening here. I couldn’t be more excited about how fast this Venthood pulls out the aroma cooking on all 5 burners can put out. The second speed was my old Venthood highest speed. This was a review that was easy to post. The Comercial stainless steel structure makes this product a easy sell. I would definitely recommend this if you’re in the market for a new Venthood. And the remote control is so helpful when cooking and something on the range starts to let off too much aroma.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Curt

customer_reviews.title: Good Suction
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks good but light is very dim. need to place the lights. I am happy with it heavy weight need two or more person to install. It has powerful fans. Comes with a plug and easy to plug in. Value for the money. Comes with a remote control and easy to operate with minimum distance. Stainless steel is strong and easy to clean. Sucks when cooking with heavy oil and grease. Overall unit is powerful and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. Strong fan. However, if using as “ductless” be prepared. On low fan it blows open the cabinet door above. Would not recommend for ductless use. Too powerful. Will be switching over to ducting this unit outside.
customer_reviews.author: laura diko

customer_reviews.title: A nightmare
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rangehood mainly because of its power: 900 CFM, and look. It does look good but has not sucking power. The noise level is also higher than I expected particularly for the two lower power levels. I guess it may be too later for a refund. It might be my hard luck because some other people had good reviews. I hope the seller or manufacture can help to fix the problem. I used to have another range hood with less CFM but worked much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful range hood
customer_reviews.text: Great looking range hood. It has great suction power, but it is rather loud, even on the lowest setting. I wish the lights were brighter. My last range hood had lights with two settings, and the lower setting may have been brighter than the one setting on this range hood. But i didn't see other high quality range hoods with two settings, so I'll just have to adjust to the dim lighting. Having said that, I'm quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cammie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: After alot of research, I selected this Cosmo product. I am amazed at the power and suction of the motors and also the quietness of operation. I also like the option of being used either ducted or ductless with the addition of the charcoal filter kit. This unit was also delivered in one day. I like the blue digital display and the remote control. Now looking forward to many years of use with this professional product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhinojogger

customer_reviews.title: SMOKERS DREAM
customer_reviews.text: Got a new construction house and the Whirlpool fan from the builder was useless (250 cfm). Have had it installed a couple weeks now and on high, its still quieter than the existing fan was. Hard to say I love a fan, but honestly, I do. 6/6/2020 UPDATE: changing the stars to 1 because the damper is now making all kinds of noise inside the fan. And the damper used to close quietly after it turned off. Now about 5 minutes after it's off, it closes with a huge bang.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas SD

customer_reviews.title: Well Built
customer_reviews.text: The unit is built with 2 squirrel cage fans and thick stainless. It is over 50 lbs and it is better to have 2 people to install it. Pluses are; it is well made and it moves a lot of air. Negatives are; low speed is too noisy and the the lights do not spread over the work area. Overall I am very pleased with the unit. Also, not about the product, the price dropped $20 about a week after I purchased it and Amazon refused to credit me the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jake NR

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful all smoke is gone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and powerful. Total 4 level fan settings. I usually keep it at lv3. The lv4 setting is loud but who cares, it is so powerful all the smoke goes right up. And I got this for my cafe commercial use. Very happy about the product. Highly recommended this product and I will buy again if my home exhaust hood every goes down need a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: K. Young

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for getting rid of cooking odor.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because the previous under cabinet unit didn't suction out the air as well. After I installed this, there is no odor after cooking. It has multiple speed. In higher speed, its bit noisey. Otherwise, best investment so far.
customer_reviews.author: Md Huda

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and good design
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I will add a Cosmo hood cover to make it look like the range vent goes up to the ceiling although I have it out to the wall. I hoped that the noise level will be lower. Will try to address that with duct padding when I install the cover. Power is excellent and the features are easy to use and complete. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Vivek Pathela

customer_reviews.title: The best kitchen Hood ever
customer_reviews.text: very good, is powerful and no more searching all over the internet to buy filters every two months my wife loves. the installation is simple I install it only in 40 minutes but it would be much faster and easier with two people
customer_reviews.author: Galvanche

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install nice features and it’s rated at 900 CFM. I can’t measure the CFM but I can tell you this is powerful. Our use this for brewing beer and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install but it’s definitely a more than one person job due to how heavy it was. In my case I used a portable car jack and a couple of small planks of wood to help me lift it when I was screwing it in but other than that I had no problem installing it. The lights definitely could be brighter seeing as I have to turn on my kitchen lights during the day to see when the one I had previously was bright enough. The vents work pretty well so I have no qualms with it. I’ve only been using it for a couple days but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Best Vent Hood for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these vent hoods I have installed in my home. The first one was 3 years ago. The second I just installed and it looks and works well. Everything about the fan is world class and the four speeds do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product about a month back and have been using it since. I wanted a high CFM unit for removing the odor of cooking on high heat. This is a perfect fit for my needs. The has has 4 speeds and does a great job in venting the fumes and odor. It get s a little bit loud on the highest setting but I guess that is to be expected when using the full CFM capacity. The install was really easy and the instructions provided were very helpful. I had a question regarding the install and the customer service people were extremely helpful in answering my question. Overall I am really satisfied this the performance thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep Sohoni

customer_reviews.title: For me is noisy
customer_reviews.text: Bigger then I thought, but I’m love the filters I’m think is a little too noisy for me , also is so heavy , you need to install properly, because is really heavy
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth juarez

customer_reviews.title: Great suction!
customer_reviews.text: I love the powerful suction of the Cosmo! And the aesthetics, well, it's just beautiful. My kitchen is still a work in progress but I can see how the Cosmo enhances the kitchen. It's relatively quiet considering it's 900 CFM. I thought the installation was pretty challenging, though. Once it was in place and being utilized, well, it was worth it. I've never had such an efficient, effective range hood before. It really does a great job! I plan on uploading another pick once the backsplash is up and the paint is on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, sleek, easy to use and install.
customer_reviews.text: Fan is powerful so it's noisier on the highest speed but not annoying. Easier to install than we thought and we had never installed one before. Love the washable grease filters and remote control. Ours is mounted higher than the standard 24" so we needed more cfu. This fan is sleek, easy to use, and powerful enough for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: ARae

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Buying online is always a little scary. However this Cosmo fan is everything they said it would be. It came professionally boxed with no damage. The fans provide all the exhaust power I was looking for. We grill indoors and it handles it very well. I would recommend this range hood to anyone demanding a quality product at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: tomandles

customer_reviews.title: Best Vent Ever
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this unit. It is very attractive and also very efficient. Noise level is extremely good considering the power of suction. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well, Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. suction power is enough for any kind of cooking at home. Much much better than the one came with the house. The price is only a fraction of what's out there in retail stores. I paid for professional installation because it needed an eight inches vent which I don't have. only complain is that when it's on level 4, max level, it's super loud. other levels are OK.
customer_reviews.author: John Wu

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit to replace old almond colored hood. Can't beat the price compared to others on the market. The unit seems to be built strong and is alot heavier than the old unit. Install wasn't to difficult my son and I did it in about 45 minutes. The suction power is way more than our last unit. I love the commercial baffles and the LED lights. The stainless steel matches our new kitchenaid appliances almost perfectly. Hopefully the dependability is good also. Definitely recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Frith

customer_reviews.title: Install either wall mounts or top of the hood mounts, not both
customer_reviews.text: We installed this August 2020 for our kitchen remodel and it was very simple and looks great. It is very strong and is perfect for our new larger stovetop. Directions weren't very clear, but fortunately they give two high quality templates. I suggest you only tape one or the other up and only use wall mounts or top of the hood mounts, not both. Remote is cool, but probably will never get used.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Trojan

customer_reviews.title: stylish and functional range vent
customer_reviews.text: The new Cosmo 3 speed vent we just installed last week has been fantastic thus far. It is very sleek and fits well with our new kitchen and cabinets. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Eslynn

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: It’s everything it is said to be. Love the safety gas sensor. Didn’t care for the sticker on front that took a lot of elbow work to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hart

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan to replace the one that came with my new house because I couldn't reach the buttons to use it. I love this fan. It's attractive and I can reach all the buttons plus it has a remote control. There are four fan speeds but I doubt I'll ever need three and four. The only thing I can say against it is that it says it's 36" but it's 35 !/2". I know that sounds minor but you can see the space on either side between my cupboards.
customer_reviews.author: gragra

customer_reviews.title: More for the looks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product believing it has high 900 CFM, but I don't believe that is the power I'm getting from the hood. Running at the highest level, F4, I still get plenty of smell of the cooking inside my new house. I think if you are buying it for the looks, it is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LL Pasadena

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Pretty easy to DIY install.
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to install DIY. The exit hole for the power cord should be more to the left of what is in the template because of the way the strain relief is done. It would be better if there is one more SS clamp for the duct. The unit only came with one. I am happy with the performance. Even on low, it is sucking better than my old 200CFM unit.
customer_reviews.author: YM

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: I've never install a range hood before but after a few minute from ready the instruction my wife and I install the QS90 in less then 1 hour. She and I both really love the fan power and the lighting is just right. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: RG3

customer_reviews.title: Not really 900cfm, but 500
customer_reviews.text: It was advertised as 900cfm before, somehow the listing is changed to 500cfm. A lot of people bought it for the 900cfm power, but now I feel fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Much better than my current range hood
customer_reviews.text: I need a powerful range hood but I have to install it under the cabinet and also I have a window on the back. This cosmo model perfectly fit my kitchen. Install is not easy, if you can find some wood to help it will be much better. It has 4 levels and the maximum level get a little bit noisy but it really sucks in the correct way.
customer_reviews.author: LarryS

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly impressed with the look and quality of this vent hood. The instructions and mounting options were easy to understand and it runs perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Paul McNerney

customer_reviews.title: Great, suitable for large kitchens, it's a bit bulky.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, its strong and it does what its supposed, the only thing will be the noise, it's very loud, but for the size I guess it's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Eliseo Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: powerful range hood
customer_reviews.text: Modern looking range hood that goes with every house, powerful enough for every day cooking, it's a bit too loud but I think this is for all powerful range hood, quieter one is not as good in suction power. It is a great buy so far, hope it will be good for years. (Was trying to add a photo but did not see this option any more.)
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and polished
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful range hood. Powerful, I was able to stir fry some food without having lingering oil smells in air or even on my clothes! The lower settings are silent, but it is fairly loud when on full power. I’m happy to live with the sound though given how powerful it is. There is a light underneath which helps when we’re cooking. The remote is in a drawer somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Yish Chong

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This certainly sucks up air, important when something get burned. I had bought one earlier from home depot with only one fan...it was useless. This one cost more but has two fans...lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: alljkl

customer_reviews.title: Range hood looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this range hood after shopping on Amazon for a couple of weeks. I checked out the reviews and compared similar items and brands. I decided on the Cosmo QS90 and boy am I glad I did! It was fairly easy to install, looks fantastic and the 900 cfm really moves some air!! I encourage you to check it out!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G Robinson

customer_reviews.title: lovin it so far
customer_reviews.text: Great product quality, very strong fan as well. definitely not a one man job, the wife had to assist me lol, very heavy item would not want to drop and scratch it so far so good A+ item
customer_reviews.author: Thuy

customer_reviews.title: Low noise level easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Use in kitchen above range, good suction and not too noisey
customer_reviews.author: Manus

customer_reviews.title: Been great
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking range hood vent. Noise level is moderate, not quiet. Very well built. Only complaint is it is extremely heavy, definitely need a helper or two, or a lift jack. Other than that been working great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Ng

customer_reviews.title: Working Great So Far
customer_reviews.text: I've never purchased an appliance from Amazon, but I gave it a try. The Cosmo vent I purchased was better than I expected. Fairly easy to install even though the instruction is not clear on some parts, and it is working great and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this Hood. It’s made from quality materials and not flimsy. It was easy to install. The fans work great so far. It looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: bienes213

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, Sleek Design and Simple Usage
customer_reviews.text: This was installed by my contractor, but by the numbers it's on the high end of venting for 36 inch ranges. Vent ducting is 8 inches, so ensure that your exit port is large enough. Just put it in this week, so I haven't put it to the test yet, but we ran it through the cycles and the noise levels are much improved from our previous hood. Very pleased so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, works well
customer_reviews.text: looks great, nice lighting, you will need to change out your vent stack in most cases, most homes have a 4 inch, this unit has an 8 inch vent, it is a little noisy but it gets the job done, definitely requires 2 people to install
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but a little on the loud side
customer_reviews.text: In many ways this is a great product. It looks great and it has great suction. But in reality it is very heavy and this makes it difficult to install. Also it is loud even on the low setting. Still, it is a quality product that is well made.
customer_reviews.author: T N

customer_reviews.title: Moves a lot of air
customer_reviews.text: This unit definitely moves grease, smoke, and odor out of the kitchen. Very so,I’d and heavy unit. Requires 2 people to install.
customer_reviews.author: steve green

customer_reviews.title: worst customer service
customer_reviews.text: worst item i bought on amazon .came damage grill try to get replace i don't know what they keep on saying they need some things .becoz i had already install it i don't want to take it out and send back for returns.its just one grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: InstLlation a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy to instAll . Tried to contact vendor but no reply
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Superior quality with excellent performance. Yes it’s a two-man job to install, but the quality is exceptional. Love the stainless steel filters!
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: great range
customer_reviews.text: the range does its job! my neighbors always smell my food! lol you can see the heat and steam being sucked out. it is loud but it's okay since it works well
customer_reviews.author: mamaof3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks great. Wife loves it in our new kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: ken57

customer_reviews.title: COS-QS90 under cabinet
customer_reviews.text: It was on time, well packed and intact. It looks great and works perfectly fine. I am using this as ductless so I am waiting for my ductless kit cfk5. I will recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Martola

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen
customer_reviews.text: No lock for touch screen so when you clean it it turns on the fan or changes the time
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Cosmo QS90 36-in Under-Cabinet Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: Nice elegant appearance, lights are excellent, several selection of suction which makes it very appealing. Suction is very good It does remove most of the smell of cooking. I like the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chin YI

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: It's fine design. Nice looking. Good quality. Easy control. My wife and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I just bold the COS-QS90 and just got installed, It work great so far with a strong suction system. It's full metal body, because of it weight. I Think you need to have a Jack or a person to help you have before you installed.
customer_reviews.author: kiet pham

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Suction is really good. Sound at low speeds is very quiet. Full speed, the sound gets high but its expected for this type of suction. Overall very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Praveen Dugar

customer_reviews.title: Really worth it i love mine
customer_reviews.text: Before i had a ductless hood after installing this all the cooking smell and smoke went away and it really worth it with the price bit noise but idont mind
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Very high end!
customer_reviews.text: This venthood is very high end. It was better than I expected and a great price as well. I will definately purchase other products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect one
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned about noise level before purchasing, only Fan setting 4 is little noisy
customer_reviews.author: Dinesh

customer_reviews.title: Great suction  power
customer_reviews.text: This fan was installed in the garage where I weld and spray paint in inclement weather. Very pleased with the suction power and ease of installation. A lot of bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G

customer_reviews.title: Very Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my outdoor kitchen. It is a perfect match for what I needed. Very well constructed and suction seems very good. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Ty

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sturdy material and components of the range hood. Installation instructions where good, but not excellent; more detail description of how to use different mount screws would be beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed I.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great range hood! strong suction power, noise level is good, even comes with a remote control. Fairly easy to install. It was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Zhou

customer_reviews.title: The range hood was easy to install and works great
customer_reviews.text: The range hood was easy to install and works great. We were looking for a product that was quiet and helped to eliminate the odors of foods, specially when frying. The range hood has delivered, definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The install was fairly easy, and instructions were pretty accurate. Looks great. Noise level is a little high, but it's powerful, so happier with that.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hennings

customer_reviews.title: Good suction power
customer_reviews.text: We really like it , made our kitchen beautiful I got an email from from Andrew from cosmo
customer_reviews.author: Zachy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it is easy to clean and it’s suction power quickly clears cooking odors from my kitchen. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana B

customer_reviews.title: Low price for a professional range hood
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent buy for a 36 in stainless steel range hood. It is quiet, powerful, good look, even with a remote. A third led light will be perfect since it's 36 in wide. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Ko

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suction power
customer_reviews.text: This hood has excellent suction power, well enough for a large kitchen. The noise level is not too bad considering the powerful suction power.
customer_reviews.author: N. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: We installed a QS90 (36-in) range hood to replace an older hood while doing some remodeling in our kitchen. It looks great, is quiet, and has good air flow. Not sure if there is a better unit for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wills

customer_reviews.title: Great Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: This is the one I am looking for. Well made and sturdy range hood. Make sure you have at least 2 people to raise it up. It sucks out all the smell. My kitchen looks more beautiful after installing this one in. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: VI - DAN TRUONG

customer_reviews.title: Dim LED Lights
customer_reviews.text: LED lights are a bit dim for my preference, although they do produce less heat from my previous hood. Other than that, the installation was pretty straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cruzado

customer_reviews.title: I just fount  new style NACO1-36”
customer_reviews.text: Too low for my cabinet I would like return and refun
customer_reviews.author: Sang Ngo

customer_reviews.title: VERY POWERFUL SUCTION
customer_reviews.text: It is so quiet,the noise was very low. Easy to install. it is a great price for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Hood. House no longer smells of spices. Product looks good and works well.
customer_reviews.author: ashraf

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Vent Hood
customer_reviews.text: Good price for what you get. A bit difficult to install; but it's definitely a heavy duty vent.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy installation. Fan is quiet and effective. Light works well and the unit looks great installed in my white kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grease collector can’t be secured
customer_reviews.text: Everything works ok, and the hood looks beautiful, only issue is the grease collector keeps dropping off when I turn the fan on level 2 or above. Is there a way to solve the issue?
customer_reviews.author: cz

customer_reviews.title: easy maintence
customer_reviews.text: I love my hood range , its not noisy as my old fan, it has 4 speed also provide a remote control so you can turn on and off while you are away from the fan.I love the the led lights.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I like this hood. Its digital screen is very nice. It's a little noisy but it suct very well
customer_reviews.author: Nhung

customer_reviews.title: Strong motor
customer_reviews.text: The power suction is strong. Quiet motor. Most important, the control is so convenient when you're lazy to walk to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Vo

customer_reviews.title: Great range hood
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for the price. Would recommend to anyone looking for a great oven hood.
customer_reviews.author: amy purcell

product_meta.title: Cosmo COS-QS90 Under Cabinet Range Hood with 500 CFM, Permanent Filters, LED Lights, Convertible from Ducted to Ductless (Kit Not Included), 36 in., Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Style:HoodCosmo presents a modern professional under cabinet range hood perfect for homeowners and builders with limited space. Fits easily into an existing cabinet, has premium brushed stainless steel that matches seamlessly with existing kitchen appliances for a modern upscale look. Our under cabinet range hood features a 500 CFM motor with premium stainless steel baffle filters to trap grease and oil. Newly designed, this under cabinet range hood is both energy efficient and quiet, utilizing high lumen LED lighting for year-round cost savings. Our filters save you money year after year and are dishwasher-safe for added convenience. Trust Cosmo for your next kitchen appliance for premium quality at factory direct prices. Includes 3-prong power plug for easy use. The unit is convertible from ducted to ductless using an optional Carbon Filter Kit (Purchase Part # CFK5) that can be purchased from the manufacturer.
feature_bullets: EFFICIENT AIRFLOW: Featuring 500 CFM airflow, backlit touchscreen, 4-speed fan and twin centrifugal motors; Quickly ventilate your kitchen without the noise of competing range hoods; Optional Carbon Filter Kit for ductless (Purchase Part # CFK5)

EASY-TO-CLEAN FILTERS: Cosmo ARC-FLOW Permanent Filters are dishwasher-safe and extremely durable. No need to replace these filters, simply drop in the dishwasher for easy maintenance and cost savings
CONTEMPORARY MODERN DESIGN: Designed to fit under a kitchen cabinet or against a wall, this range hood adds sophistication to your kitchen. Made of premium 430 grade, 20-Gauge thick stainless steel
POWERFUL ENERGY EFFICIENT LIGHTS: The energy-efficient, 2-watt LEDs are long-lasting and provide bright, high lumen LED lighting for better visibility at night

5 YEAR LIMITED PARTS: Our customer support team is based proudly in the USA; Product Dimensions: 35.4" (W) x 22" (D) x 10" (H); Electrical Requirements: 120V/60Hz, 3 Prong Plug; Duct Size: 7.5 in. Round

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars233 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
